mapper.update:
update t_secret_robot_content
secret_id = #{secretId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
text_or_picture = #{textOrPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sorting = #{sorting,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
extend_data = #{extendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_secret_robot_content set secret_id = #{secretId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, text_or_picture = #{textOrPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sorting = #{sorting,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content_type = #{contentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, extend_data = #{extendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tsrc.id, tsrc.secret_id, tsrc.text_or_picture, tsrc.sorting, tsrc.content_type, tsrc.create_time, tsrc.extend_data from t_secret_robot_content tsrc where tsrc.secret_id=#{secretId}
